name: express-bookings
description: Your REST API for managing bookings

scripts.dev: npx prisma db push --force-reset && npx prisma db seed && nodemon src/index.js
scripts.test: npx prisma db push --force-reset && npx prisma db seed && npm run test-positive && npm run test-negative
scripts.reset-db: npx prisma db push --force-reset && npx prisma db seed
scripts.clean-start: npx prisma db push --force-reset && npx prisma db seed && npm run dev
